projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
h5.Description

For TIMOB-25948, I was trying to track down the NDK version used. I had to introduce a step in the Jenkinsfile that cat'd the releases.txt file in order to find this out seeing as this might have the potential to cause bugs we should log the NDK version used in the build process
fields.summary: Android: Log Android NDK version on module build
